scriptItem.label: Duplicate Node As Reference
scriptItem.scriptCode:
import hou import sys from op_menu import node_ref
nodes = kwargs['items']
node_ref.dupNodeRef(nodes)

scriptItem.label: Copy Node Reference
scriptItem.scriptCode:
import hou import sys from op_menu import node_ref
node = kwargs['node']
node_ref.copyNodeRef(node)

scriptItem.label: Paste Node Reference
scriptItem.scriptCode:
import hou import sys from op_menu import node_ref
print(kwargs) node = kwargs['node']
node_ref.pasteNodeRef(node)
